name: sachet
effect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.
short_effect: Traded on a Spritzee: Holder evolves into Aromatisse.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A sachet filled with fragrant perfumes
that are just slightly too overwhelming.
Yet it’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
